messages.subject: kids online
messages.msgSnippet: ... Could you elaborate?  What precisely do you do to screen out ? Kids and internet safety came up IRL for my dd this week.  I m not worried about it, but
messages.messageBody:
>>>>>>>>>>>I supervise to screen out net predators, but that's all. He's way ahead of me in cyberspace. Anna>>>>>>>>>>>

Could you elaborate? What precisely do you do to "screen out"?

Kids and internet safety came up IRL for my dd this week. I'm not worried about it, but have had a couple of people tell me that I should be. Dh is concerned that she will stumble onto porn sights (hasn't happened yet) and a friend shared her concern that children shouldn't use their real names, not even just first names, online.

Mary Ellen

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
